answers.answer: I Googled "foot rash and diabetes" and got 258,000 hits. http://tinyurl.com/c7zo8dIf you father and brother had this what was the outcome/treatment? Have you seen a doctor? A Dermatologist?

question: I have a reddish brown smooth rash on the top of my foot. There is no pain and doesn't itch. It seems to be going up my ankles. My brother and father had this as well as diabetes 2..I have diabetes 2 also..Is there an association here, or does anyone know what it may be?
title: Top of foot rash and diabetes
